Class Post

java.lang.Object
Post
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Post class holds all the posts for a person. It is implemented in Stack ADT.
See Also:
Serialized Form
